name: Dreamland (itch) (Lacia)
description:
Dreamland is a 2-player adventure puzzle game, made for University as part of the Solent Game Cup 2019 with the theme of 'Dream'. 

Artwork and Sound is not my own.

One of the players is in the normal realm, whilst the other is in Dreamland. They must work together to find ways to interact between the lands to overcome obstacles in their way. 

The game is designed to be used with two X-box controllers, however alternative Keyboard input is available. (Any controls displayed in game are X-box only, press jump to start)

Keyboard Controls:

Player 1Player 2Move LeftARightMove RightDLeftInteractSDownJumpWUp
